statements: UPDATE athlete_profiles SET weight = 75.5 WHERE athlete_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';

UPDATE athlete_profiles SET first_name = 'Alice', last_name = 'Smith', date_of_birth = '1990-05-15', height = 170.5, weight = 65.3, training_history = '{"strength": true, "endurance": false}', performance_data = '{"sprints": {"time": 10.5, "distance": 100}}' WHERE athlete_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE athlete_profiles SET weight = 70.8, height = 175.2, training_history = '{"strength": false, "endurance": true, "flexibility": true}', performance_data = '{"sprints": {"time": 11.2, "distance": 100}}', date_of_birth = '1985-10-20', first_name = 'Bob', last_name = 'Johnson' WHERE athlete_id = '987e6543-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
